data.title: Editorial Style Guide
data.meta_description: Editorial Style Guide    An editorial style guide (or writing style guide) is essential for brand consistency. It helps writers and editors communicate clearly and consistently about the Sorority. Our Style Guide clarifies many elements of writing
data.text: An editorial style guide (or writing style guide) is essential for brand consistency. It helps writers and editors communicate clearly and consistently about the Sorority. Our Style Guide clarifies many elements of writing and Alpha Sigma Tauâ€™s preferences, such as word choice, spelling and capitalization rules, how we reference chapters, and more. Use the search bar below to search the full guide.
